detaileddescription.para: LibSteel comes pre-installed with the examples in the examples/ folder of RISC-V Steel repository. If you start a new project out from one of the examples, LibSteel will be automatically built and linked to your application.

We strongly recommend starting a new project from one of the examples. By doing so, you don't have to worry about linking scripts and the complex options you need to set to get GCC cross-compiling for your embedded application.
See the a new project section of the Software Guide for instructions on how to start a new project from the examples.
